title: Login just to logout?
body:
Everytime for the last week when I try to login I get pass the login screen then when I'm on home page on game, it goes window.exe.... and the game closes.... I've done everything from running as administrator, turning firewall off, checking for corrupt files, making sure windows is updated, deleting league and redownloading... but it still pops up whenever I login to the game?!?.... I was just playing ranked/regular games last week so why did this all of the sudden pop up this week?
https://gyazo.com/dd744b6f6e2989f9c73ffdaa16d153fb

replies.body:
It looks like your client is completely disconnecting from the game platform service, which causes the crash after login. Since the login server and game platform are separate, you could have issues routing specifically to the game platform servers. I strongly recommend ensuring your network settings are optimized for League with our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
